docs.text: api.go Documentation : https://fernandocelmer.github.io/api.go/ Source Code : https://github.com/FernandoCelmer/api.go Installation To install, simply run: go get github.com/FernandoCelmer/api.go Example package main import ( "io" "net/http" web "github.com/FernandoCelmer/api.go/src" ) func main() { app := web.NewApp( web.Title("API"), web.Description("Minimalist API Test"), web.Version("0.1.0"), ) app.Get("/hello", helloHandler) app.Run(8080) } func helloHandler(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) { io.WriteString(w, "Test") } Commit Style ⚙️ FEATURE 📝 PEP8 📌 ISSUE 🪲 BUG 📘 DOCS 📦 PyPI ❤️️ TEST ⬆️ CI/CD ⚠️ SECURITY License This project is licensed under the terms of the MIT license.
